resources.string: PassGuessing
The main Goal of the game is to guess the password, you have to guess the numbers in their order. The password will contain 4 numbers.
The numbers you tried will be displayed with their value of accuracy, the accuracy is measured using two variables, namely CORRECT and POSITION. You win if you get 4 for correct and position.
****** Correct: tells you how many of the numbers are found in the password, like if password:4826 and your guess is 8613, then correct will be 2, which is 8 and 6.
****** Position: tells you how many of the correctly guessed numbers are in their exact location on the password. In the above example position will be 0.
LEVEL ONE TO LEVEL FOUR
LEVEL FIVE TO LEVEL SEVEN

Starting from level one to level four, reputation of number and zero are not included in the password, your guess should be free of zero and any reputation of number. 4580, 7297,and 0253 are examples that will be rejected.

Starting from level five to the last level their is no restriction on how the password should be, it only need to be combination of 4 numbers.
\n
-> At level five *** zero is allowed \n
-> At level six *** reputation is allowed \n
-> At level seven *** zero and reputation are allowed \n

In the each level you will have fixed amount of life time: every time you try something the amount will decrease. It will be displayed in the screen. For the first level you will have 15, for the second level 12, for the third level 9, and for the last level 6.
MULTI PLAYER SETTINGS

To play Multi Player, press the multi player Button. Then a Layout out with buttons will be displayed, press each one of them carefully.
\n The first one is to select level, so select any level you want. after selecting the level you want you both have to enter your passwords separately
\n

While you are entering the password be careful of two things, first your opponent could snitch and try to look the password
\n Second the password must be with accordance to the level selected. It means, if you select level one, you can not enter zero or reputation in the password you are creating
\n Level Rule
\n Level One: both restricted
\n Level Two: no reputation
\n Level Three: no zero
\n Level Four: both allowed

We believe that any resource should be freely distributed to those who need it, User should enjoy our game with out any cost, also he/she must feel free to integrate the code as they want. That is why we make it open source.
The main trick in this game is not to find the correct numbers, you will get good at finding the numbers . The game is to find their correct position in the required try or life amount
If your first try was 2468 and your second was 1357, then if the sum of the even and odd is not 4, it means 9 is included in the password
In your first try enter even numbers like 2 4 6 8, and then odd numbers 1 3 5 7 it will help you to cover all the numbers

When you are trying to find the correct ones by changing one or two numbers, dont write the same numbers in same position, if the number you tried was 2536, and you want to change 36 by 87, make it like 8725 or 8275.
If you want to check another numbers, dont wast your heart or try amount on a single number. Make good judgment and change attlist two numbers in any try
If you are playing With reputation, sometimes using only one number could be important.
